event_text: m_c couldn't help but try to show off by climbing the tallest tree {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} plan backfired when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/fell/falls} out of the tree.
history_text: m_c was scarred after falling from a tree.
m_c died from their wounds after falling from a tree.

event_text: m_c went out of camp alone to practice swimming in the ocean, unfortunately {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} inexperience led to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} being swept up by a riptide. r_c heard {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cries and saved {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, but m_c almost drowned.
history_text: m_c died from watery lungs after nearly drowning in the ocean

event_text: m_c's paw pads aren't used to all the salt water {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} been traipsing around in since becoming an apprentice, they've become cracked and sore.

m_c was dashing around the apprentice rock when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} slipped and fell into the high tide waters of the cave. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} alright, if a bit bruised and embarrassed.

m_c was messing around in the tide pools of the camp clearing when {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw slipped and {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell in face first. {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pride is wounded, but otherwise {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} only bruised.
m_c unwisely decided to go out swimming alone after r_c dared {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} made it back, but ended up drenched and shivering violently in the cold air.
history_text: m_c died after swimming in freezing water.

event_text: m_c rarely pays attention when r_c talks about proper ocean safety and it shows when m_c gets thirsty on patrol and drinks salt water. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/come/comes} back to camp severely dehydrated.
history_text: m_c died after drinking salt water and becoming dehydrated.
